      • Match

        public Match(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
             int numPlayers,
             int skulls,
             boolean frenzyEn,
             java.lang.String mode)
        This constructor instantiates the match
        Parameters:
        players - This parameter is the list of the players that are playing
        numPlayers - This parameter is number of player that are playing
        skulls - This parameter is the number of skulls that the game'll have
        frenzyEn - This parameter is the frenzy enable, true if the players want the frenzy turn, false otherwise
        mode - This parameter is the mode that the players are playing
